# Responsive Design Prompt

1. Build layouts with fluid units (`clamp`, `vw`, percentage) and CSS flex/grid to adapt across breakpoints.
2. Use the shared spacing/radius tokens to maintain rhythm on all screen sizes.
3. Add media queries at 599px (handset), 959px (tablet), and 1279px (desktop) to align with Angular Material breakpoints.
